Amazing competitive game, will bring you to your next level in FPS gaming! Think before every move and the smoother you do it - the better you will become! teaches you strategy, pacing, positioning and overall a very fun game - sweaty sometimes, but any competitive game - this is a good thing !

i spend to much time in this game

Aside from the constant unbalanced guns (which is more developer over compensation/inconsistent testing) this game is phenomenal, it doesn't leave much to be desired, the original tactical FPS that no one doesn't know about. Loot crates are always 50/50 in games like this but again, the content is available for everyone, you don't need it, but you CAN have it. Doesn't affect gameplay mechanically or statistically, just visually.
